page.title: 08Services Around Handsacre
page.content: Three mobile vans cover a small part of Armitage with Handsacre.Some of the bus services are not reliable to come on time and some are dirty.In each of Hill Ridware,Mavesyn Ridware and Pipe Ridware there is one Post box.In Handsacre there are 3 Post boxes. In Armitage there are two.In Armitage with Handsacre there are 5 part time post ladies.To cover Hill Ridware Pipe Ridware and Mavesyn Ridware there is only one Post Man.The post is normally collected between 7.00am and 10.00am every morning.There is a mobile libary that comes every Tuesday.The garage at Handsacre offers servicing as well as petrol.It sells used cars.Another service in the area is "Bens Van Hire" Mr.Ben Hawkins is also a grocer and a butcher.The van hire costs 24 pounds a day.
